organization.description: The organization the user belongs to

id.description: The unique identification number of the user

node_id.description: The ID assigned to the user in the GraphQL API

avatar_url.description: The URL of the user's avatar image

gravatar_id.description: The Gravatar ID associated with the user's email

html_url.description: The URL of the user's GitHub page

followers_url.description: The URL listing the user's followers

following_url.description: The URL listing the users being followed by the user

gists_url.description: The URL of the user's gists

starred_url.description: The URL listing repositories starred by the user

subscriptions_url.description: The URL listing repositories the user is subscribed to

organizations_url.description: The URL listing organizations the user belongs to

repos_url.description: The URL listing repositories owned by the user

events_url.description: The URL of the events that the user has been involved in

received_events_url.description: The URL of events received by the user

type.description: The type of user account (e.g., User or Organization)

site_admin.description: Specifies if the user is a GitHub site administrator
